content: anthology a colourwork hat and cowl recipe by tin can knits it is possible we are addicted to the art of the swatch with all of our designs we start with a swatch or a swatch project like a hat cowl or pint-sized sweater anthology gives you the template to begin your colourwork exploration it s a great place to play with colour and experiment with motifs knitting a swatch project means
